constraint_message_mustCompleteActivityB.value: 你必须完成当前所有的 {0} 中所有的项目才可以离开。
constraint_message_mustCompleteActivityB.description: The message shown to students telling them to complete work on the current activity before exiting

constraint_message_mustCompleteXBeforeVi.value: 开始这个步骤或活动之前你必须完成：
constraint_message_mustCompleteXBeforeVi.description: The message shown to students telling them to complete work on previous items before working on the selected step or activity

constraint_message_mustVisitXBeforeVisit.value: 开始这个步骤或活动之前你必须看过：
constraint_message_mustVisitXBeforeVisit.description: The message shown to students telling them to visit items before working on the selected step or activity

constraint_message_mustUnlockXBeforeVisi.value: 开始这个步骤或活动之前你必须解锁：
constraint_message_mustUnlockXBeforeVisi.description: The message shown to students telling them to unlock (make visitable) previous items before working on the selected step or activity

constraint_message_xMustHaveStatusY.value: 开始这个步骤之前你必须已经将下列步骤从 '{0}' 设置为 '{1}' ：
constraint_message_xMustHaveStatusY.description: The message shown to students telling them that the steps shown below must have 'statusType' set to 'statusValue' before they can work on the selected step

error_msg_with_reason.value: 发生错误。请与WISE工作人员联系。原因：{0}

mywork_preview_mode.value: 预览模式下无法显示［我的作业］。在教学中正式使用时，这里将显示你的工作和成绩。
mywork_preview_mode.description: Text to display when user clicks on review work button in preview mode

flagged_preview_mode.value: 预览模式下无法显示已标记的作业。在课堂运行时，这里将显示教师已经标记的的工作。
flagged_preview_mode.description: Text to display when user clicks on flagged work button in preview mode

student_assets_preview_mode.value: 预览模式下无法显示［学生上载资源］。在教学中正式使用时，学生可以在这里上载宝物（如图片），并在回答中使用他们的宝物。
student_assets_preview_mode.description: Message to show users when they click on student assets button in preview mode

session_timeout_warning.value: 你已经有好长时间没有活动了。如果你再不刷新的话，你将被WISE注销。
session_timeout_warning.description: Warning text to display to users in the session timeout alert.

session_timeout_confirm.description: Text to display on button in the session timeout alert that users can press to renew session.

session_timeout_message.value: 你没有活动的时间太长了，你已经被WISE注销了。请再次登录以继续。
session_timeout_message.description: Text to display to display to users when there session timed out and they have been logged out of WISE.

session_timeout_title.description: Title text for the session timeout alert.

classroomMonitor_stepProgress_completion.value: 步骤完成数无法获取。可能是下列两种情况之一：1. 您的学生还未运行项目；或者，2. 这是一个在WISE启动步骤进度监视之前就已经开始了的运行。您还是可以通过选择步骤标题查看学生的工作。
